addAdditionalPrompts: E lei lava ni faasinoga na e faia i lau polokalame
addAtTimeEvent: Faaopoopo lenei poloka i lau itulau galue<title name="UNIT">"sekone"<value name="N"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM"></title></block></value></block></XML>
addJoinBlocks: O loo e lolomiina upu tonu lava na tuu ifo. Taumafai e faaopoopo nisi mataitusi i ai i le faaaogaina o le poloka tuufaatasi.
addPrintBlock: E manaomia ona e faaopoopo se poloka lolomi i lau faailo: <xml><block type="gamelab_printText"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><title name="TEXT"></title></block></value></block></xml>
addPrompt: E manaomia ona e faaopoopo se poloka faasino i lau faailo: <xml><block type="gamelab_setPrompt"><value name="QUESTION"><block type="text" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><title name="TEXT"></title></block></value><value name="VAR"><block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
addPromptWithChoices: E manaomia ona e faaopoopo se poloka faasino i lau faailo: <xml><block type="gamelab_setPromptWithChoices"></block></xml>
addSpaces: O le feau tusitusi na lolomi o loo iai ni nai avanoa e le o faatumuina. E mafai ona e iloa poo fea avanoa e manaomia ona faatumu?
addText: Faaopoopo ni upu i lau itulau ma se poloka lolomi: <xml><block type="gamelab_printText"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><title name="TEXT"></title></block></value></block></xml>
addTitleScreen: E manaomia ona faaopoopo se ulutala o le itulau mo lau poloketi.
addWhenTouchesEvent: E manaomia ona iai se poloka 'when touches' mo soo sau sprite e te tago iai. <xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"blue alien"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"pink alien"</title></block></value></block></xml>
addWhenTouchesEventToMakePetGrow: Faaopoopo se poloka  'when touching' ma faatupu ai lau fagafao pe a ai
allBehaviors: Tautuana o sprites uma e tatau ona iai ni amioga
allSayBlocks: E tatau ona tofu le spirte ma se poloka 'say'.
answerPrompt: Aua le galo ona taina se faatonuga i totonu o lau faasinoga
answerPromptWithChoices: O lau faasinoga e tatau ona tuu atu ni filifiliga se tolu i le tagata. Aua le galo ona tuu ai se tali mo lau faasinoga pe a uma ona faaalu lau polokalame.
atLeastOneSpriteStillMoving: O le itu lelei o se tasi o au sprites sa minoi. E tatau ona sse poloka 'stops everything' mo sprite taitasi.
bananaUnchanged:
Faaaoga se poloka 'set size' ina ia faalapoa ai le banana sprite. Faaaoga se size e ova atu ma le 100. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"face_banana_1"</title></block></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">150</title></block></value></block></xml>
behaviorBeforeClick:
Ua vave ona faatino e lau sprite se amioga. Toe tuu i lalo o le poloka event. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"blue alien"</title></block></value></block></xml>
behaviorNotStopped: Ua amata e lau sprite se amioga fou ae lei tuu le amioga tuai. E tatau ona mautinoa o loo fesootai lenei poloka ma lau faailo.
behaviorsIncreased: E lei tuu le amioga o lau sprite. Ia taofi se amioga tuai, faaaoga le poloka lenei.
bottomLeft: Ave se tasi o au sprites i lalo i le itu agavale o le itulau e ala i le faaaogaina o le <xml><block type="gamelab_location_picker"><title name="LOCATION">'{"x":100,"y":100}'</title></block></xml>
bottomRight: Ave se tasi o au sprites i lalo i le itu taumatau o le itulau e ala i le faaaogaina o le <xml><block type="gamelab_location_picker"><title name="LOCATION">'{"x":300,"y":100}'</title></block></xml>
butterflyDidntMove: O le butterfly sprite e lei minoi. Toe taumafai se isi amioga.
butterflyDidntMoveXY: O le pepe e lei fealuai. Toe taumafai se isi amioga.
cardAddPrompt:
E manaomia e lau polokalame ona fesili i le tagata se fesili se tasi. 
O leisi laasaga o le faaopoopoina o se faasinoga. O le faataitaiga, e mafai ona fesili mo le igoa o le tagata. Toe faaigoa le fuainumera i se upu poo se faailo poo se ata e faamanatu ai poo a faamaumauga na <xml><block type="gamelab_setPrompt"><value name="QUESTION"><block type="text" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><title name="TEXT">Who is this card for?</title></block></value><value name="VAR"><block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><title name="VAR">name</title></block></value></block></xml>teuina.
cardAddtext: O lea ua mautu ma faatulagaina lou faasinoga, e mafai ona e faaaoga le poloka lolomi e faaaoga ai le masini faatalanoa e fetaliai ai ma le tagata:<xml><block type="gamelab_printText"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><title name="TEXT"></title></block></value></block></xml>
cardAnswerPrompt: Aua le galo ona taina se faatonuga i totonu o lau faasinoga
cardExplore: Ua uma vaega manaomia mo le poloketi, ae faaauau pe a e mafai. Fesili i le tagata nisi fesili faaopoopo pe fai nisi galuega i amioga, vaaiga i tua, ma faaleo poo le musika. Oomi le "Keep Playing" e fai ai ni suiga i lau faailo ona toe faaalu ai lea. Oomi le "Continue" e faaauau ma faauma ai lau poloketi.
cardNoBehavior: O  loo ola lou faasinoga. Afai o loo faia galuega sa e faatonuina, e mafai ona tuu ni amioga i lau sprite e faaola ai. Taumafai e faaaoga ni amioga eseese e tusa ma le faamoemoe ina ia mafai ona lelei le fesootaiga o lau poloketi.
cardNoSprites: O loo ola lou faaO  o loo ola lou faasinoga. Afai o loo faia galuega sa e faatonuina, e mafai ona amata ona faaopoopo ni sprite i lau poloketi. Faaopoopo ai ni meaai mananaia, meaalofa, poo ni ata.
cardPrintVariable: E foliga mai o loo tali mai le masini faatalanoa, ae e lei lolomiina le vaega sa e taina i le faasinoga. Tautuana ia sao le fuainumera **variable** o loo fesootai ma lau poloka lolomi.
cardPrintWhenAnswered: O le taimi nei e faatasi ona lolomiina le laupepa. Tautuana ia iai se poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka 'when answered'.
cardTitleVariable: E foliga mai na e faaopoopoina se ulutala o le itulau i lau polokalame, ae lei iai ni upu mai lou faasinoga.
changeBackground: O le vaaiga i tua e le o suia.
changeClickedSpriteBehavior: Ua sui uma amioga o au sprites sei vagana le tasi na oomiina. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'clicked sprite' e maua i totonu o lau poloka event.
changeColorTouchedOnly: Ua sui uma lanu o au sprites sei vagana le tasi na pai i ai. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'object sprite' e maua i totonu o lau poloka event e sui ai lanu i taimi le faatulagaina le lanu o le sprite e toatasi
changeColorWhenKeyPressed: O le lanu o le spirte e le o suia. Faaopoopo lenei poloka i lau event fou: <XML><block type="gamelab_setTint"><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"blue alien"</title></block></value><value name="COLOR"><block type="colour_picker"><title name="COLOUR">#ff0000</title></block></value></block></XML>
changeLocation: Faaaoga lau pin i le poloka o nofoaga e faaminoi ai lau sprite<xml><block type="gamelab_location_picker"><title name="LOCATION">'{"x":200,"y":200}'</title></block></xml>
changeOrSetCostume: E leai ma ni au sprite na suia o latou lavalava
changeOrSetCostumeEvent: Tautuana ia faaaoga se event e sui ai lavalava o lau sprite
changeOrSetCostumeUseClicked: Ua sui uma lavalava o au sprites sei vagana le tasi na oomiina. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'clicked sprite' i totonu o lau poloka event
changeOrSetSize: E leai ma ni au sprite na suia o latou size
changeSpriteBehaviorsWhenClicked: E tatau ona sui le amio o le sprite pe a oomiina.
changeSpriteBehaviorsWhenTouch: E manaomia ona sui le amioga o sprites pe a papai ma isi sprites.
changeVariableBlock: Faaaoga le poloka 'change by' e sui ai numera teu i lau fuainumera. O le poloka lenei e tatau ona alu i lalo o le poloka event.
chatbotAddPrompt: O le isi laasaga o le faaopoopoina o se faasinoga. O le fesili poo a fesili e te manao e fai e le masini faatalanoa. E mafai ona e faaioga le fuainumera i se upu poo se ata poo se faailo e mafai ai ona e manatua poo a faamaumauga na teu.
chatbotAddtext: O lea ua mautu ma faatulagaina lou faasinoga, e mafai ona e faaaoga le poloka lolomi e faaaoga ai le masini faatalanoa e fetaliai ai ma le tagata:<xml><block type="gamelab_printText"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><title name="TEXT"></title></block></value></block></xml>
chatbotAnswerPrompt: Aua le galo e ta ni upu poo ni faailo i totonu o lou faasinoga. O a ni tala e mafai ona fai e le tagata e tali ai fesili a le masini faatalanoa?
chatbotExplore: Ua uma vaega manaomia mo le poloketi, ae faaauau pe a e mafai. Faatonu le masini faatalanoa e fai ni fesili faaopoopo pe fai nisi galuega i amioga, vaaiga i tua, ma faaleoga poo le musika. Oomi le "Keep Playing" e fai ai ni suiga i lau faailo ona toe faaalu ai lea. Oomi le "Continue" e faaauau ma faauma ai lau poloketi.
chatbotNoBehavior: O lau masini faatalanoa o loo ola. Afai o loo faia galuega sa e faatonuina, e mafai ona tuu ni amioga i lau sprite e faaola ai. Taumafai e faaaoga ni amioga eseese e tusa ma le faamoemoe ina ia mafai ona lelei le fesootaiga o lau poloketi.
chatbotNoSprites: O lau masini faatalanoa o loo ola. Afai o loo faia e le faasinoga galuega sa e faatonuina, e mafai ona e amata faaopoopo ai ni sprite i lau poloketi. Faaopoopo se masini faatagata e fai ma faailo o le masini faatalanoa, pe filifili seisi mea.
chatbotPrintVariable: E foliga mai o loo tali mai le masini faatalanoa, ae e lei lolomiina le vaega sa e taina i le faasinoga. Tautuana ia sao le fuainumera **variable** o loo fesootai ma lau poloka lolomi.
chatbotPrintWhenAnswered: O le taimi nei e faatasi ona lolomiina le laupepa. Tautuana ia iai se poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka 'when answered'. E faafoliga ai o loo faatali le masini faatalanoa mo sau tali ae lei aumai sana tali.
chatbotTitleVariable: E foliga mai na e faaopoopoina se ulutala o le itulau i lau polokalame, ae lei iai ni upu mai lou faasinoga.
chooseSound: E manaomia ona e filifili se faaleo poo se musika mai le itulau o le drop-down<xml><block type="gamelab_playSound"><title name="SOUND">Choose</title></block></xml>
clickAllSprites: Tautuana ia oomi sprite taitasi pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"*
clickAnySprite: Tautuana ia oomi soo se sprite pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"*
clickButNoEvent: Na e oomiina le sprite ae lei iloaina e lau code le event. Ia vaai poo iai sau poloka event o le 'when clicked' ma ua sao lavalava o le sprite ua e filifilia.
clickButNoPrint: Na e oomi ni sprite se tele ae lei lolomi se tusitusiga. Faaopoopo le poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka event taitasi o le 'when clicked'.
clickButNoSay:
Na e oomi le sprite ae lei fai se tala. Faaopoopo le poloka 'say' i lalo o le poloka event o le 'when clicked'. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSay"><title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"default"</title></block></value></block></xml>
clickButNoSpeech:
Na e oomi le sprite ae lei fai se tala o se tasio sprites. Faaopoopo le poloka 'say' i lalo o lau poloka event o le 'when clicked'. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSay"><title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"default"</title></block></value></block></xml>
clickNewSprite: Tautuana ia e oomi lau sprite fou ma o loo iai foi ma le poloka event o le 'when clicked' i lau itulau galue.
cloudDidntMove: O le cloud sprite e lei minoi. Toe taumafai se isi amioga.
cloudOnlyMovedY: Na alu i luga ma lalo le ao ae le o le agavale ma le taumatau. Toe taumafai seisi amioga
colorChangedBeforeKeyPress: Na sui le lanu o lau sprite i le taimi sese. Faaalu i le poloka 'change color; lalo o le poloka 'when key pressed'.
createAtLeastThreeSprites: E manaomia ona iai ni au sprites se tolu. Fai ni sprites se tolu i lalo o le poloka 'when run'.
createAtLeastTwoSprites: E manaomia ona iai ni au sprites se lua. Fai ni sprites se lua i lalo o le poloka 'when run'.
createDraggableSprite: E manaomia ona tuu meaai mo le fagafao e amata ona iai le amioga o le 'being draggable'.
createNotDraggableSPrite: Na o meaai sprite e tatau ona tosogofie. Aveese le amioga mai lau fagafao.
createTwoDraggableSprites: O meaai o lau fagafao ma le uo a le sprite e manaomia ona amata ona iai le amioga 'being draggable'.
createVariable: E manaomia ona e faatulaga se fuainumera
debugBehaviors: O loo iai se faaletonu e uiga i au amioga.
debugEvents: O loo iai se faaletonu e uiga i au events.
debugGroups: O loo iai se faaletonu e uiga i au vaega o sprites.
debugProps: O loo iai se faaletonu e uiga i vaega auiliili o sprite.
debugSprites: O loo iai se faaletonu e uiga i au sprites.
debugVariables: O loo iai se faaletonu e uiga i au fuainumera.
didntMoveDown: E lei alu i lalo lau sprite.
didntMoveLeft: E lei alu i le agavale lau sprite.
didntMoveRight: E lei alu i le taumatau lau sprite.
didntMoveUp: E lei alu i luga lau sprite.
didntPressKey: Ia oomi le au pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"*. E mafai ona e oomi le ki lanu moli lalo o le mea e taaalo ai poo le oomi o ki o lau keyboard.
eventNotDetected: E lei iloaina le event. Vaai poo sao le poloka event o loo iai i au galuega ma ua sao *lavalava* i poloka taitasi o le faailo.
eventsOneChange: Ua sui lau sprite, ae na o le tasi lava le taimi. Toe faataitai lau polokalame e ala i le oomiina o lau ki mo si na taimi, ma ia faaaoga le poloka sao.
eventsWrongBehaviors: E tatau ona 3 lava ni amioga o lau sprite. Taumafai e tuu le poloka 'stops everything' i se isi nofoaga o lau faailo.
foodNotTouchPet: Toso meaai lau sprite ina ia pai atu i lau sprite fagafao
genericBonusSuccess: Malo galue! Ua uma le laasaga, e aafia ai le luitau faaopoopo.
genericExplore: Lelei. Oomi le "Keep Playing" e fai ai ni suiga i lau faailo ma toe faaalu. Oomi le "Continue" pe a e sauni mo leisi luitau.
genericReplay: Tautuana e toe faaalu ma toe ta ni taimi se tele le ata faataitai ae lei faaauauina.
genericSuccess: Ua e uma le laasaga! Oomi le Continue e faaauau ai.
growAndShrink: E manaomia e lau sprite ona itiiti ona toe tutupu.
haikuBlock: E le aliali ae le haiku. Afai ua uma ona faaopoopo le poloka, siaki faalelei le fuainumera ua faaigoaina i lau faailo ma tautuana ua tali uma faasinoga.
hideTitleScreen: Na e faaopoopo le ulutala o le itulau ae e lei aveeseina. Faaaoga le poloka 'hide title screen' i lalo o le poloka event, i le 'at 3 seconds' poo le 'when up pressed'.
keyPressButNoEvent:
Tautuana ia iai lenei poloka i lau itulau galue:
<XML><block type="gamelab_keyPressed"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><title name="KEY">"up"</title></block></XML>
madlibAddPrompt:
O le isi laasaga o lau fai o se faasinoga. O le faataitaiga, e mafai ona e fesili mo se "object" poo se "adjective". Toe faaigoa le fuainumera i se isi mea e fesoasoani ai e faamanatu poo a faamaumauga na teuina. 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_setPrompt"><value name="QUESTION"><block type="text" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><title name="TEXT">Enter a food:</title></block></value><value name="VAR"><block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><title name="VAR">food</title></block></value></block></xml>
madlibAddtext: O lea ua mautu ma faatulagaina lou faasinoga, e mafai ona e faaaoga le poloka lolomi e faaaoga ai le masini faatalanoa e fetaliai ai ma le tagata:<xml><block type="gamelab_printText"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><title name="TEXT"></title></block></value></block></xml>
madlibAnswerPrompt: Aua le galo ona taina se faatonuga i totonu o lau faasinoga
madlibExplore: Ua uma vaega manaomia mo le poloketi, ae faaauau pe a e mafai. Fesili i le tagata nisi fesili faaopoopo pe fai nisi galuega i amioga, vaaiga i tua, ma faaleo poo le musika. Oomi le "Keep Playing" e fai ai ni suiga i lau faailo ona toe faaalu ai lea. Oomi le "Continue" e faaauau ma faauma ai lau poloketi.
madlibNoBehavior: O  loo ola lou faasinoga. Afai o loo faia galuega sa e faatonuina, e mafai ona tuu ni amioga i lau sprite e faaola ai. Taumafai e faaaoga ni amioga eseese e tusa ma le faamoemoe ina ia mafai ona lelei le fesootaiga o lau poloketi.
madlibNoSprites: O loo ola lou faasinoga. Afai o loo faia galuega sa e faatonuina, e mafai ona amata ona faaopoopo ni sprite i lau poloketi. O le a le faatatau o lau tala poo lau solo?
madlibPrintVariable: E foliga mai o loo tali mai le masini faatalanoa, ae e lei lolomiina le vaega sa e taina i le faasinoga. Tautuana ia sao le fuainumera **variable** o loo fesootai ma lau poloka lolomi.
madlibPrintWhenAnswered: O le taimi na o le tasi le taimi e te lolomiina ai le laupepa. Tautuana ia iai se poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka 'when answered'.
madlibTitleVariable: E foliga mai na e faaopoopoina se ulutala o le itulau i lau polokalame, ae lei iai ni upu mai lou faasinoga.
makeSpritesWithEvent: E manaomi le toe fai o nisi sprite pe a iloa se event.
moreSprites: E manaomia ona fai nisi sprite se tele.
moveBothWays: E tatau ona tasi se itu e alu ai lau sprite, ona alu ai lea i leisi itu.
moveOnlyClickedSpriteWithBehavior: Na minoi uma sprites sei vagana le tasi na oomiina. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'clicked sprite' ma le poloka o le 'sprite begins'. Vaai ia filifili se amioga e faaminoi ai le sprite.
moveSpriteByDrag: Manaia tele lau faailo. Mo le tosoina o lau sprite, oomi iai a o faaalu le polokalame.
moveSpriteLocation: O au sprites o loo i le nofoaga e tasi. Ave se tasi o au sprites i le faaaogaina o le poloka 'location'.
noBehavior: E manaomia e lau sprite se amioga
noNewBehavior: E lei amata lau sprite ma se amioga fou
noPropChangeKeyPressed: Na e oomi se ki ae lei suia ai lau sprite. Tautuana o le poloka 'change size' ia lalo o le poloka event.
noSecondCostumeForCollector: E tutusa uma lavalava o au sprites. Vaai poo e le aveeseina ni sprites se tele.
noSound: E manaomia lau taina o se faaleo
noSprites: E manaomia ona fai se sprite
noSpriteStoppedMoving: E le o tuu le minoi o au sprites. Fesootai i le poloka 'stops everything' lalo le poloka fou o le event.
noTitleScreen: E le o aliali se ulutala i le itulau
noVarUse: E manaomia le faaaoga le fuainumera mai le faasinoga i le upu ua tuu i le itulau
outbreakChangeHealthy: Taumafai e sui le numera o sprites aitu
outbreakChangeSize: Taumafai e faatulaga uma sprite i size eseese
outbreakClickHealthy:
E le o faia ni masks o aitu malolosi. Oomi le sprites pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"* ma taumafai ia sao le faailo:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakClickSick:
E le o faia ni masks o aitu mamai. Oomi le sprites pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"* ma taumafai ia sao le faailo:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakCostumeTab: Oomi le ki 'Costumes' i luga o le mea taalo e faaopoopo ai lavalava mo le sprite i lau poloketi.
outbreakMakeHealthySprites:
Faaaoga le poloka lenei e fai ai le aitu malosi mo au sprites:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"healthy"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">10</title></block></value></block></xml>
outbreakMakeUnhealthySprite:
Fai nei loa se sprite aitu mai se tasi i le faaaogaina o le 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sick"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value></block></xml>
outbreakNoneRecovering: Tautuana e faaaoga le poloka 'sprite begins recovering' *i le uma* o le poloka 'make new sprites'<xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sick"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">recovering</title></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakOneRecovering:
Tautuana e faaaoga le poloka 'sprite begins recovering' i lalo o le event 'when touches':
 <xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">recovering</title></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakRecovering:
Tautuana e faaaoga le poloka 'sprite begins recovering'  i lalo o lau poloka event 'when touches':
 <xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sick"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">recovering</title></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakReplaySuccess: Tautuana e toe faaalu ma toe ta ni taimi se tele le ata faataitai ae lei faaauauina.
outbreakSetSizeBlock: Ua lapoa tele au sprites. Faatulaga le size o sprites i le 50 (pe laitiiti ifo) i le  <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"/></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>. O le poloka lenei e fai *pe a uma* na fai au sprites.
outbreakSubjectPointer:
Faatumu le pu ua avanoa i le poloka 'change costume' i le poloka mataupu.
 <xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakSuccess: Ua uma le laasaga. A ua e sauni mo leisi luitau, oomi le Continue.
outbreakUseCostume: O lavalava fou o lau sprite e lei aliali ae i lau ata faataitai. Oomi le matauila pe afai e te manaomia se fesoasoani.
outbreakWander: E manaomia ona minoi au sprites. Faaminoi uma sprite i le amata ma le <xml><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple" uservisible="false"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">wandering</title></block></value></block></xml>. O le poloka lenei e alu *pe a uma* ona e faia au sprites.
petNotGrowOnTouch: O lau meaai ma lau fagafao na papai leisi i leisi, ae e lei tuputupu ae lau fagafao. Faaopoopo le poloka 'change size' i le poloka event o le 'when touching' mo lau meaai ma lau fagafao.
playerBehavior:
Tuu se amioga i le sprite e tutusa ma ituaiga gaiogia e te manao iai. 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple">
  <value name="SPRITE">
    <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
      <field name="ANIMATION">"bunny2_1"</field>
    </block>
  </value>
  <value name="BEHAVIOR">
    <block type="gamelab_playerBehaviors">
      <field name="BEHAVIOR">new Behavior(moving_with_arrow_keys, [])</field>
    </block>
  </value>
</block></xml>
printMoreText: O se amataga lelei lenei. Faaopoopo nisi upu ina ia faauma ai le laasaga.
printVariable: Ua e lolomiiina upu i le taimi sao, ae e lei lolomi upu na e taina i le faasinoga. Tautuana ia sao le label **fuainuera** na fesootai i lau poloka 'print'.
printWhenAnswered: Na lolomi lau tusitusiga, ae lei faia i le taimi sao. Tautuana le poloka 'print' o lalo le poloka 'when answered':<xml><block type="gamelab_whenPromptAnswered"><value name="VAR"><block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false"><title name="VAR">???</title></block></value></block></xml>
printWithEvent: Tautuana ia iai le poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka event, e pei o le 'at 3 seconds' poo le 'when up pressed'.
promptExplore: Lelei! Na ola lelei e pei ona e manao iai? Oomi le "Keep Playing" ia fai ai suiga poo le "Continue" e faaauau.
reinfFeedbackMsg: Ua e uma! Oomi le "Continue" e faaauau i le isi laasaga.
removeOnlyClickedSprite: Na aveese uma sprites sei vagana le sprite na oomiina. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'clicked sprite' faatasi ma le poloka 'remove'.
removeOnlyTouchedSprite: Na aveese uma sprites sei vagana le sprite na pai iai. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'subject sprite' poo le 'object sprite' faatasi ma le poloka 'remove'.
removeSpriteWhenClicked: E manaomia ona aveese le sprite pea oomiina.
removeSpriteWhenTouch: E manaomia ona aveese se sprite pe a pai iai se isi sprite.
renameVariable: Filifili se isi igoa ese mo lau fuainumera. Oomi le '???' ma toe faaioga i se isi mea e pei o le 'count' poo le 'score'.
sayBlock:
Ta se upu poo se faailo mo le sprite e fai ai se tala i le poloka 'say'.
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSay"><title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"default"</title></block></value></block></xml>
sayBlockEmpty: Na e faaaoga le poloka 'say', ae lei tali mai le sprite i se upu. Ia mautinoa ua e tuu foi ni upu e mafai ona fai e le sprite.
saySprite: E lei faia se tala a le sprite.
sayUseClicked: Na tautatala uma sprites sei vagana le tasi na oomiina. Taumafai e faaaoga le poloka 'clicked sprite' i totonu o lau poloka event.
sayVariable:
Faatonu le sprite e tau mai le taua o lau fuainumera. Vaai ia tutusa le lable ma lou faailo. 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSayTime">
    <value name="SPRITE">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <field name="ANIMATION">"purple bunny"</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="TEXT1">
      <block type="variables_get">
        <field name="VAR">count</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="NUM">
      <block type="math_number">
        <field name="NUM">4</field>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block></xml>
secondClickButNoPrint: Na e oomi ni sprite se tele ae lei lolomi se tusitusiga. Faaopoopo le poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka event taitasi o le 'when clicked'.
secondClickButNoSpeech:
Na e oomi ni sprite se tele ae o le tasi o au oomiga e lei faatonu ai se sprite e fai se tala. Faaopoopo le poloka 'say' i lalo o event taitasi o le 'when clicked'. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSay"><title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"default"</title></block></value></block></xml>
setSecondSpriteSize:
Faaaoga le poloka 'set size' e sui ai le size o le sprite. Faaaoga le size ese mai le 100. 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"flower2_1"</title></block></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>
shipBadPosition: Faaaoga lau poloka o nofoaga e tuu ai lou vaa i lata ane i pito i luga <xml><block type="gamelab_location_picker"><title name="LOCATION">'{"x":100,"y":275}'</title></block></xml>
shipStayedInBounds: E tatau ona tuu ese lau sprite mai le ata. Taumafai e faaaoga se amioga e pei o le "moving east"
singleSpriteNotClicked:
Ia e oomi i se sprite ma ia sao events o loo iai i lau itulau galue.
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title></block></xml>
spinBeforeClick: O lena sa taavilivili lau sprite ae e te lei oomiina. Ia mautinoa o lau amioga o taaviliga na fesootai ma le poloka event lenei.
spinBothWays: E manaomia ona taavilivili lau sprite i le agavale ma le taumata, i taimi eseese.
spriteDidntRotate: E lei taavilivili lau sprite. Toe taumafai se amioga ese
spritelabFeedbackAliensNotInLine: O au aitu tagata sprites e tolu e manaomia ona faatulaga i se laina faalava (i totonu o le 50 pixels).
spritelabFeedbackAstronautMoveToCorner: O le sprite malaga i le vateatea e manaomia ona tuu atu i se tasi o tulimanu e fa.
spritelabFeedbackBlueAlienBehavior: O lau aitu tagata lanu moana e manaomia ona amata se amioga fou.
spritelabFeedbackChangeBackgroundColor: E manaomia ona sui le ata o le vaaiga i tua i se isi foliga mai le paepae
spritelabFeedbackClickSprite: Tautuana ia oomi lau sprite pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"*
spritelabFeedbackClickSprites: Tautuana ia oomi lau sprite pe a uma ona oomi le *"Run"*
spritelabFeedbackCreateFishWithBehavior: E manaomia ona fai se sprite ia se tasi ma tuu iai se amioga.
spritelabFeedbackCreateThreeAliens: E manaomia ona fai se aitu tagata lanu moa, aitu tagata piniki ma le aitu tagata lanu samasama.
spritelabFeedbackCreateTwoDifferentSprit: E manaomia ni sprites se lua ma lavalava eseese.
spritelabFeedbackCreateTwoSprites: E manaomia ona fai tonu ni sprites se lua.
spritelabFeedbackDifferentStarRotation: O sprites e lua o loo iai lavalava fetu e manaomia ona tutusa le taimi e faataamilo ai.
spriteLabFeedbackGiveFishBehavior: E manaomia lou tuu atu o se amioga i lau ia
spritelabFeedbackGiveSecondSpriteBehavio: E manaomia e lau sprite lona lua se amioga
spritelabFeedbackMoveFishLeftRight: E manaomia e lau i'a sprite ona minoi i le agavale poo le taumatau. Taumafai e sui ana amioga.
spritelabFeedbackMoveUpNotDown: E manaomia e lau sprite ona minoi i luga (matu) ae le o i lalo (saute)
spritelabFeedbackNeedAlienStopBehavior: E manaomia e au sprite tauaitu ona taofi a latou amioga
spritelabFeedbackNoAlienColor: E tasi o au aitu e lei suia le lanu
spritelabFeedbackPinkAlienBehavior: O lau sprite tauaitu piniki e lei amatalia se amioga
spritelabFeedbackRobotFasterThanRover: Na oo muamua le masini faatagata i le itu taumatau o le screen i le rover
spritelabFeedbackThreeSpritesWithCostume: E manaomia ona fai ni sprites se tolu ma ni o latou lavalava eseese.
spritelabFeedbackTwoSpritesWithCostumes: E manaomia e au sprites e lua ni o la lavalava eseese.
spritelabFeedbackTwoSpritesWithCostumesA: E manaomia ona fai ni sprites se lua e eseese o a lavalava ma tofu foi ma ni amioga
spritelabFeedbackUseCostume: E manaomia le faaaogaina o se lavalava se tasi
spritelabFeedbackUseFishCostume: E manaomia le faaaogaina o se lavalava ia se tasi
spritelabFeedbackUseSpinningBehavior: E manaomia e lau sprite ona faatamilomilo. Taumafai e sui ana amioga.
spritelabFeedbackYellowAlienBehavior: E lei amatalia le amioga a le aitu samasama
spriteMovedTooSoon: Ua vave ona minoi le sprite. Taumafai e faaminoi le amioga i lalo o le <xml><block type="gamelab_atTime"><title name="UNIT">"seconds"</title><value name="N"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">8</title></block></value></block></xml> block.
spriteNotClicked:
Vaai ia e oomi i sprite taitasi ma o sao events o loo i totonu o au galuega. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title></block></xml>
spriteNotClickedWithBlockXML:
Ia e oomi i se sprite ma ia sao events o loo iai i lau itulau galue.
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
spritesNeedSameCostumes: Vaai ia tutusa lavalava o sprites uma.
spritesNeedUniqueCostumes: Vaai ia eseese lavalava o sprites uma.
spritesNotDefaultSize: E tatau ona sui le lapopoa o sprites pe a oomiina. Vaai poo fesootai le poloka 'change size' i le poloka event o le 'when clicked'.
spritesNotTouch: Vaai ia fepai sprites i se taimi
startBehaviorWhenClicked: O au sprite fou e manaomia ona amatalia se amioga pe a oomiina
starterSprites: E foliga mai ua aveese se sprite. E mafai ona faaopoopo pe toe faafou lau polokalame i le faaaogaina o le ki Version History o loo i lalo
startingSpritesShouldNotTouch: Mo le amatalia, vaai ia aua nei fepai au sprites. Faaaoga le pine i le poloka o nofoaga e tuu eseese ai latou.
startSpriteBehaviors: Vaai au sprites ia iai ni amioga ae lei atoa le 5 sekone. E manaomia ona e oomi i au sprites ina mafai ona latou amata?
strawberryUnchanged:
Faaaoga se poloka 'set size' ina ia faalaitiiti ai le strawberry sprite. Faaaoga se size e lalo atu ma le 100. 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"face_strawberry_1"</title></block></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>
subject: mataupu
subtitleVariable: O le ulutala laitiiti o le ulutala o lau screen e lei taulia ai upu mai upu amata.
sunDidntRotate: O le sun sprite e lei taamilomilo. Toe taumafai se isi amioga.
thirdClickButNoPrint: Na e oomi ni sprite se lua ae lei lolomi se tusitusiga. Faaopoopo le poloka 'print' i lalo o le poloka event taitasi o le 'when clicked'.
thirdClickButNoSpeech:
Na e oomi sprite e sili atu i le lua ae o le tasi o au oomiga e lei faatonu ai se sprite e fai se tala. Faaopoopo le poloka 'say' i lalo o event taitasi o le 'when clicked'. 
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSay"><title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"default"</title></block></value></block></xml>
titleVariable: O le ulutala o lau screen e lei taulia ai upu mai upu amata.
tooManySprites: Ua tele tele au sprites. Fai na o ni sprites e te manaomia e tusi ma faatonuga o i luga.
topLeft: Ave se tasi o au sprites i luga i le itu agavale o le itulau e ala i le faaaogaina o le <xml><block type="gamelab_location_picker"><title name="LOCATION">'{"x":100,"y":300}'</title></block></xml>
topRight: Ave se tasi o au sprites i luga i le itu taumatau o le itulau e ala i le faaaogaina o le <xml><block type="gamelab_location_picker"><title name="LOCATION">'{"x":300,"y":300}'</title></block></xml>
useColorVariable: Faaaoga se fuainumera e faatulaga ai le lanu mo le vaaiga i tua pe a tali i le fesoasoani taiala.
useSetpropBlock:
Faaaoga se poloka 'set size' e toe faatulaga ai le lapoa sprite.
 <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"face_strawberry_1"</title></block></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>
useTwoAtTimeBlocks:
O lau polokalame e tatau ona iai ni poloka events se lua 'at seconds'. O le event muamua o lea faaaoaga e fai ai nisi sprites ma o le event lona lua o le a faauma ai le taaloga. *Mo le pasia o lenei laasaga, taumafai e faatulaga poloka event taitasi i le 10 sekona pe lalo ifo.
 <xml><block type="gamelab_atTime">
  <field name="UNIT">"seconds"</field>
  <value name="N">
    <block type="math_number">
      <field name="NUM">3</field>
    </block>
  </value>
</block><block type="gamelab_atTime">
  <field name="UNIT">"seconds"</field>
  <value name="N">
    <block type="math_number">
      <field name="NUM">10</field>
    </block>
  </value>
</block></xml>
useTwoSetpropBlocks:
Faaaoga se poloka 'set size' e toe faatulaga ai le lapopoa o au sprite taitasi.
 <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"face_strawberry_1"</title></block></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>
whenToWhile:
O loo alu solo lau sprite, ae le o alu malie. Sui le 'when' i le 'while' i poloka event taitasi. 
 <xml><block type="gamelab_keyPressed"><title name="CONDITION">while</title><title name="KEY">???</title></block></xml
workspaceAlertError: Ua taofi lau polokalame ona o loo iai se faaletonu: {error}
